input.sentences: the special day has arrived and mommy and daughter are excited .
children carrying balloons are anxious to see their loved one .
family members are waiting for the organization helicopter to land .
the troop and his family are finally reunited and are all happy .
husband and wife share an intimate kiss after 5 years of not seeing each other .
output.sentences: Last June, families of soliders were invited to welcome their loved ones home.
Children played and had fun while waiting see their parents again.
While other family members waited anxiously.
The soldiers began to disembark and rushed to their families.
Happy reunions were all around that day.
